snippet: Now that the gluttony of the holiday season is over, we can all be on our best behavior. That includes travel companies, several of which are turning over a new leaf for the New Year.
abstract: Now that the gluttony of the holiday season is over, we can all be on our best behavior. That includes travel companies, several of which are turning over a new leaf for the New Year.

headline.main: New Year's Resolutions From the Travel Industry
